GENERAL

i'm typhnol (he/him), typh shortened, an average internet lurker. this website was made for fun, please don't bother with the terrible web design. heavily inspired by MOTHCPU's neocities page. i'll love any game that's fun and has a good story. i'll listen to anything that sounds good to my ears.
